inline.description:
Focus should be in System Console search box on opening System Console or refreshing pages in System Console
â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“
  1. Main menu âžœ System Console, observe focus is in search box
  2. Navigate to another page such as Site Statistics, observe focus is *not* in search box
  3. Refresh, observe focus is back in search box
  4. Spot-check on 4 or 5 additional pages
inline.expectedResult: • Focus in search box on first opening System Console, and on refreshing on any page

customFields.Related ticket(s):
(Story - Won't Do) Server Logs page: On refresh and CMD/CTRL+A, keep focus in search box â€” MM-17491
Webapp: Admin Console > Server Logs does not focus to sidebar filter upon reload â€” MM-32549
(Duplicate) Focus should be in 'Find settings' search box on refreshing Reposting > Server Log page â€” MM-32717
customFields.Important notes about this step: On the Server Logs page, refreshing briefly puts focus in search box, then focus switches to the Logs table (it has always been expected that focus is on the table on opening this page, but refresh behavior possibly should be changed to be consistent with other pages.
